src: 一位友好的哥谭市民
dst: Citizen Tan, a friendly taxi driver

src: 中不不建交是受印度的影响。
dst: The establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Bhutan is influenced by India.

src: 骑车差点摔跤，还好我一把把把把住了
dst: I almost fell off my bike, but luckily I managed to hold onto the handlebar.

src: 我背有点驼，妈妈说“你的背得背背背背佳
dst: I have a bit of a hunchback, and mom said, "You need to use BeiBeiJia for your back."

src: 祝你全家幸福！
dst: I wish you and your family happiness!

src: 郭麒麟刷牙选中华为的就是干净，速度快。
dst: Guo Qilin chose Zhonghua toothpaste for brushing his teeth because it's clean and fast.

src: 广州人和牲畜配种中心
dst: Guangzhou Renhe Livestock Breeding Center

src: 数学王子秦老师
dst: Mathematics teacher Wang Ziqin

src: 男子跳河轻生河水没过脖子。
dst: A man attempted suicide by jumping into a river, the water rose above his neck.

src: 一位漂亮的女孩说：今日本美女面色蜡黄，不适合上班。
dst: A beautiful girl said: Today, this beauty looks pale and is not fit for work.

src: 我们家热得快炸了。
dst: Our Fast Heat at home broke down.

src: 你去班上数数数数数不好的有多少
dst: Go to the class and count how many can't even count properly.

src: 只有小孩才说喝茶，成人用品
dst: Only children say "drink tea", adults say "taste tea".

src: 汉黄香九岁温席奉亲。
dst: Huang Xiang of the Han Dynasty warmed her parents' quilt with her body.

src: 华强答应郝哥买瓜。
dst: Huaqiang promised Brother Hao to buy melons.

src: 这车是卖书的的。
dst: This vehicle belongs to the book seller.

src: 你什么时候都可以来，但就是我方便的时候不能来。
dst: You can come anytime, but you can't come when I go to the toilet.

src: 没有秃顶的人没有秃顶的人厉害。
dst: People who are not bald are not as good as people who are bald.

src: 请不同意不下课的同学不要不举手。
dst: Please don't raise your hands if you disagree with not ending the class.

src: 海水朝朝朝朝朝朝朝落。
dst: The seawater rises with the tide, rising every morning, rising and falling every day.

src: 浮云长长长长长长长消。
dst: The floating clouds spread, often spreading everywhere, frequently dissipating and fading away.
